name: Rohan R
headline: Building products at the intersection of technology and AI.
bio: A product-minded engineer blending UX, systems thinking, and modern frontend craft. I Help Companies Build Reliable, Scalable Web Platforms | Performance Optimization • Frontend Architecture • Modernization
about1: I build scalable, performance-critical products with a focus on front-end architecture, reliability, and system modernization. I enjoy owning features end-to-end and working closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality experiences users love.
about2: Taking ownership from requirements to production, ensuring speed, quality, and stability at scale.
